post:
HiFiveHost is a privately held firm that has been providing fully premium managed services.
We carefully chose high-quality servers, networking, and infrastructure equipment to ensure high reliability with a 99.95% uptime guarantee!

Why Choose HiFiveHost?
  • Staging sites, dedicated IP addresses, instant auto-scaling
  • On-demand performance testing to troubleshoot & improve site speed
  • Content delivery network(CDN) with advanced caching for ultra-fast loading
  • Proactive security you don't have to think about, built right into your Magento hosting
  • Always-on security monitoring & support from Magento experts 24/7/365.
  • We believe in complete transparency. There are no hidden fees. You pay the price that you see on our website.

Server/Application Software Stacks:
  • Apache/Nginx
  • MySQL
  • PHP
  • React
  • Redis
  • Varnish Cache
  • Elasticsearch
  • Content delivery network(CDN)
  • Firewall Services

Note: The Application stacks can be different as per the hosting platform for managed and unmanaged servers.

Server Recommendation & Resources For Live/Staging/Pre-production

- As currently the store has been already set up on Magento 2, so here will migrate your
existing store to the new server.

- Once the store has been set up, we will perform the below activities on the application
level.

1. Inspect every installed 3rd-party extension (If not in use, will simply disable).
2. Turn Caching On
3. Turn Production Mode On
4. Enable CSS/JS Minification
5. Use Built-in Cache, and Implement Redis Caching for Backend.
6. Enable SSL and CDN and link them with the store.
7. Enable Gzip

Backup Plan:
Here we do recommend a backup plan for the server, which can be set up off-site for the
safe side, the detailing on this plan will be suggested once you make your decision for
the server

- Connect with HiFiveHost
